HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DPD: 89 Kč. Balíkovna na adresu: 79 Kč. Zásilkovna – doručení na adresu: 79 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: převážně další pracovní den (mostly next business day)

express_delivery.delivery_time: Expresní doručení: do 60 minut. Doručení na čas: dnes nebo dle vašeho výběru.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Doprava objemného zboží: od 399 Kč. DOPRAVART – prémiová doprava: od 699 Kč.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Standard: převážně další pracovní den (mostly next business day). Premium (DOPRAVART): termín dle vašeho výběru (date of your choice).

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 49 Kč. Česká pošta – Balík Na poštu: 79 Kč. Zásilkovna – výdejna: 49 Kč.

SUMMARY:
SUMMARY: Datart (Electroworld) offers a wide range of delivery options in the Czech Republic. Standard home delivery is handled by DPD, Zásilkovna, and Balíkovna (Česká pošta), with prices from 79-89 Kč and delivery typically the next business day. Bulky items are delivered via a standard service (from 399 Kč) or a premium DOPRAVART service (from 699 Kč) with selectable delivery dates. Pickup options include free in-store collection (ready in 30 minutes), and delivery to parcel shops/lockers via Zásilkovna and Balíkovna for 49 Kč. The company does not ship abroad.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Very fast express home delivery (within 60 minutes) is available for 259 Kč. The 'RYCHLART' in-store pickup promises item readiness within 30 minutes for free. The premium 'DOPRAVART' service for large appliances allows customers to choose their delivery date.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly in a table format, making it easy to compare options, prices, and delivery times. Each option has a link for more details. The page is comprehensive, covering standard, bulky, express, and pickup point deliveries. However, it lacks information on COD surcharges and specific details about weekend delivery availability.
